name: CoreMotionPedometerDataWithSuccess
summary: Dictionary passed to the callback of the Pedometer.startPedometerUpdates() and queryPedometerData methods.

properties.name: code
properties.summary: An error code describing the error if there was one.

properties.name: currentCadence
properties.summary: The rate at which steps are taken, measured in steps per second. Note: This property is only available on iOS 9 and later.

properties.name: currentPace
properties.summary: The current pace of the user, measured in seconds per meter. Note: This property is only available on iOS 9 and later.

properties.name: distance
properties.summary: The estimated distance (in meters) traveled by the user.

properties.name: endDate
properties.summary: The end time for the pedometer data.

properties.name: error
properties.summary: An error message describing the error if there was one.

properties.name: floorsAscended
properties.summary: The approximate number of floors ascended by walking.

properties.name: floorsDescended
properties.summary: The approximate number of floors descended by walking.

properties.name: numberOfSteps
properties.summary: The number of steps taken by the user.

properties.name: startDate
properties.summary: The start time for the pedometer data.

properties.name: success
properties.summary: A Boolean indicating if the operation was successful or not.
